participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, Emily loves exploring new places and trying different things. She's friendly and enjoys meeting new people.
participant_1.background: I love to ride my bike and get ice cream with my grandpa. I would love to have lunch with Justin Bieber because he is my favorite singer and I would love to learn more about him and his music. I am a blackjack dealer. I sometimes stay up late reading horror novels, which can mess up my sleep schedule. I've been with my partner for five years.

participant_2.name: Kevin
participant_2.personality: Pragmatic and a bit introverted, Kevin values stability and routine but is also looking to make positive changes in his life.
participant_2.background: I live in my parent's basement and work a lot, so I usually don't have time for a healthy diet or exercise. I hate tofu. I'm looking forward to a career in education and finding ways to incorporate fruit into my child's diet. I'm not rich, but I enjoy playing fetch with my dogs and drinking Pepsi. I take to social media to connect with my friends and family for support.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you! How are you?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking!
That's good to hear! What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out, relaxing before going to work.
That sounds nice. What do you do for work?
I'm a blackjack dealer.
Oh, that's interesting! How do you like it?
I enjoy it a lot, it's a lot of fun and I get to meet a lot of interesting people.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy it.
Thank you! What do you do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I'm looking forward to going back to work and starting a career in education.
Oh, that's great! What subject do you want to teach?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about early childhood education.
That's a great choice! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
Thank you! I appreciate that.
You're welcome!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to ride my bike, get ice cream with my grandpa, and read horror novels.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love to read too, but I usually stick to non-fiction.
I love non-fiction too, but I also love to read horror novels. They're so much fun!
I can imagine! I've never tried reading one, but I'm not sure if I'd be brave enough.
You should give it a try! They're really good.
Maybe I will! I'm sure I'd love it.
I hope you do!
Thanks
